description: This file defines a singly linked list data structure with methods for adding, removing, retrieving size, and accessing elements by index. It includes internal classes and companion objects to manage list nodes.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation managing nodes containing String data, with methods for list operations.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: An internal class representing a node in the linked list, holding String data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Private method to detach a node from the list, updating references accordingly.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Companion object function to find the last node in the list starting from head.
